frame.name: Cause_fluidic_motion
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or a <fen>Cause</fen> causes a <fen>Fluid</fen> to move from a <fen>Source</fen> to a <fen>Goal</fen> along a <fen>Path</fen> or within an <fen>Area</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>splattered</t> <fex name="Fluid">red paint</fex> <fex name="Area">nearby</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The animate protagonist who causes the <fen>Fluid</fen> to move.
<ex>What happens if <fex name="Agent">we</fex> <t>drip</t> acid on this compound?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition:
<def-root>An event or force that causes the <fen>Fluid</fen> to move.
<ex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Fluid
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity that changes location and moves in a fluidic way. It is not necessarily in a liquid state but is construed that way.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Goal</fen> is the location the <fen>Fluid</fen> ends up in as a result of the motion
<ex>Why did you <t>squirt</t> juice <fex name="Goal">onto my chair</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Path
FE.definition: <def-root>The trajectory along which the Fluid moves, exclusive of the <fen>Source</fen> and <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Area
FE.definition:
<def-root>The setting in which the <fen>Fluid</fen>'s movement takes place along an unspecified <fen>Path</fen>.
<ex> I <t>splattered</t> red paint <fex name="Area"> nearby</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root> Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously), force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). With agentive uses, it may indicate salient characteristics of an Agent that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully).
<ex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the fluidic motion event is caused.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>A state of affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> is responding to in causing the <fen>Fluid</fen> to move.</def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition: <def-root>A state of the <fen>Fluid</fen> that results from the motion event.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location where the motion takes place.
<ex>I <t>spattered</t> the egg all over the floor <fex name="pla">in the kitchen</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> which causes the <fen>Fluid</fen> to move.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An action of the <fen>Agent</fen> which brings about the motion of the <fen>Fluid</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> is attempting to bring about by causing motion. </def-root>
